code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';var Mouse=function Mouse(){useEffect(function(){var cursor=document.querySelector('.cursor');var handleCursor=function handleCursor(e){cursor.style.top=e.pageY+"px";cursor.style.left=e.pageX+"px";};window.addEventListener('mousemove',handleCursor);var handleHover=function handleHover(){cursor.classList.add('hovered');};var handleLeave=function handleLeave(){cursor.style.transition=".2s ease-out";cursor.classList.remove('hovered');};document.querySelectorAll('.hover').forEach(function(link){link.addEventListener('mouseover',handleHover);link.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleLeave);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"cursor"});};export default Mouse;
